text: Michel Ben Akoun (born 15 February 1936) is a Moroccan wrestler. He competed in the men's Greco-Roman bantamweight at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Moroccan male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Morocco Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Casablanca
title: Michel Ben Akoun
